content:
{"latex.json":"{	
	// 要加载 tcolorbox 宏包, 不需要在此之间显式地加载 xcolor 宏包, 但若需要后者的高级功能则要显式加载
	"Tikzmark Node Highlight new Command": {
		"prefix": "hlcmd",
		"body": [
			"\\usetikzlibrary{tikzmark, backgrounds, arrows, shapes, calc, arrows.meta, positioning, shadows, trees, mindmap}",
			"\\usepackage{xcolor, xspace}",
			"\\usepackage{tcolorbox}",
			"\\newcommand{\\hlmath}[2]{\\colorbox{#1!17}{$\\displaystyle #2$}}",
			"\\newcommand{\\hltext}[2]{\\colorbox{#1!17}{#2}}",
		],
	},
	// 颜色 red, blue, purple
	// 使用 tikzmark 拓展库
	"Tikzmark Node Highlight with dynamic markname": {
		"prefix": "hl",
		"body": "\\tikzmarknode{${1:markname}}{\\hlmath{${2:blue}}{${3:highlighted-tex}}}",
		"description": "Wrap selected text with tikzmarknode and dynamic markname"
	},
	// 使用 arrows.meta 拓展库 （能完全替代 arrows）
	"Tikzmark Node Highlight with tikzpicture at left down direction": {
		"prefix": "btild",
		"body": [
			"\\begin{tikzpicture}[overlay, remember picture, >=stealth, nodes={align=left, inner ysep=2pt}, <-]",
			"\t\\path (${1:markname}.south) ++ (0,-0.8em) node[anchor=north east, color=${2:blue}!67] (${1:markname} node){${3:text}};",
			"\t\\draw [color=${2:blue}!57](${1:markname}.south) |- ([xshift=-0.3ex, color=${2:blue}]${1:markname} node.south west);",
			"\\end{tikzpicture}"
		]
	},
	"Tikzmark Node Highlight with tikzpicture at right down direction": {
		"prefix": "btird",
		"body": [
			"\\begin{tikzpicture}[overlay, remember picture, >=stealth, nodes={align=left, inner ysep=2pt}, <-]",
			"\t\\path (${1:markname}.south) ++ (0,-0.8em) node[anchor=north west, color=${2:blue}!67] (${1:markname} node){${3:text}};",
			"\t\\draw [color=${2:blue}!57](${1:markname}.south) |- ([xshift=+0.3ex, color=${2:blue}]${1:markname} node.south east);",
			"\\end{tikzpicture}"
		]
	},
	"Tikzmark Node Highlight with tikzpicture at right up direction": {
		"prefix": "btiru",
		"body": [
			"\\begin{tikzpicture}[overlay, remember picture, >=stealth, nodes={align=left, inner ysep=2pt}, <-]",
			"\t\\path (${1:markname}.north) ++ (0,+1.2em) node[anchor=south west, color=${2:blue}!67] (${1:markname} node){${3:text}};",
			"\t\\draw [color=${2:blue}!57](${1:markname}.north) |- ([xshift=-0.3ex, color=${2:blue}]${1:markname} node.south east);",
			"\\end{tikzpicture}"
		]
	},
	"Tikzmark Node Highlight with tikzpicture at left up direction": {
		"prefix": "btilu",
		"body": [
			"\\begin{tikzpicture}[overlay, remember picture, >=stealth, nodes={align=left, inner ysep=2pt}, <-]",
			"\t\\path (${1:markname}.north) ++ (0,+1.2em) node[anchor=south east, color=${2:blue}!67] (${1:markname} node){${3:text}};",
			"\t\\draw [color=${2:blue}!57](${1:markname}.north) |- ([xshift=-0.3ex, color=${2:blue}]${1:markname} node.south west);",
			"\\end{tikzpicture}"
		]
	},
	"Tikzmark Node Highlight with tikzpicture at up bridge": {
		"prefix": "btiub",
		"body": [
			"\\begin{tikzpicture}[overlay,remember picture,>=stealth,nodes={align=left,inner ysep=1pt},<-]",
			"\\node[anchor=south,color=${3:blue}!67, yshift=2em] (ttext) at ($(${1:markname1}.north)!0.5!(${2:markname2}.north)$) {${4:text}};",
			"\\draw[<->,color=${3:blue}!57] (${1:markname1}.north) |- (ttext.south) -| (${2:markname2}.north);",
			"\\end{tikzpicture}",
		]
	},
	"Tikzmark Node Highlight with tikzpicture at down bridge": {
		"prefix": "btidb",
		"body": [
			"\\begin{tikzpicture}[overlay,remember picture,>=stealth,nodes={align=left,inner ysep=1pt},<-]",
			"\\node[anchor=north,color=${3:blue}!67, yshift=-2em] (jtext) at ($(${1:markname1}.south)!0.5!(${2:markname2}.south)$) {${4:text}};",
       	    "\\draw[<->,color=${3:blue}!57] (${1:markname1}.south) |- (jtext.north) -| (${2:markname2}.south);",
			"\\end{tikzpicture}",
		]
	},
	"Latex Template cn twocolumn": {
		"prefix": "cn",
		"body": [
			"\\documentclass[twocolumn]{ctexart}",
			"\\pagestyle{plain}",
			"\\usepackage{amsmath, amssymb, amsfonts, physics, esint}",
			"",
			"\\usepackage{graphicx}",
			"\\usepackage{tabularx}",
			"\\usepackage{float}",
			"\\usepackage{cuted}",
			"\\usepackage{tikz}",
			"\\usepackage{array}",
			"\\usepackage[final]{pdfpages}",
			"",
			"\\usepackage{titlesec}",
			"\\titleformat{\\section}[block]",
			"{\\centering\\bfseries\\Large}",
			"{\\thesection}{1em}{}",
			"",
			"\\usepackage[style=gb7714-2015, backend=biber]{biblatex}",
			"\\addbibresource{ref.bib}",
			"\\usepackage[colorlinks,urlcolor=blue,linkcolor=blue,anchorcolor=blue,citecolor=blue]{hyperref}",
			"",
			"\\title{\\bf{",
			"    这里是标题",
			"}}",
			"\\author{",
			"    作者姓名",
			"    \\quad",
			"    \\textit{\\quad",
			"        学校单位",
			"    }}",
			"\\date{",
			"    \\today",
			"}",
			"",
			"\\begin{document}",
			"    \\maketitle",
			"    \\begin{strip}",
			"        \\noindent\\textbf{摘要}.",
			"            \\small{\\songti",
			"                这里是摘要.",
			"        }\\leavevmode",
			"    \\end{strip}",
			"",
			"    \\section{导言}",
			"    这里是导言",
			"    \\begin{equation}",
			"        E=mc^2.",
			"    \\end{equation}",
			"",
			"    \\nocite{*}",
			"    \\printbibliography[title=参考文献]",
			"\\end{document}"
		]
	},
	"Latex Template en twocolumn": {
		"prefix": "en",
		"body": [
			"\\documentclass[twocolumn]{article}",
			"\\usepackage{indentfirst}",
			"\\pagestyle{plain}",
			"\\usepackage{amsmath, amssymb, amsfonts, physics, esint}",
			"",
			"\\usepackage{graphicx}",
			"\\usepackage{tabularx}",
			"\\usepackage{float}",
			"\\usepackage{cuted}",
			"\\usepackage{tikz}",
			"\\usepackage{array}",
			"\\usepackage[final]{pdfpages}",
			"",
			"\\usepackage{titlesec}",
			"\\titleformat{\\section}[block]",
			"{\\centering\\bfseries\\Large}",
			"{\\thesection}{1em}{}",
			"",
			"\\usepackage[style=ieee, backend=biber]{biblatex}",
			"\\addbibresource{ref.bib}",
			"\\usepackage[colorlinks,urlcolor=blue,linkcolor=blue,anchorcolor=blue,citecolor=blue]{hyperref}",
			"",
			"\\title{\\bf{",
			"    Here is Title",
			"}}",
			"\\author{",
			"    Author, Arthor",
			"    \\quad",
			"    \\textit{\\quad",
			"        Buddhist Department of MIT",
			"    }}",
			"\\date{",
			"    \\today",
			"}",
			"",
			"\\begin{document}",
			"    \\maketitle",
			"    \\begin{strip}",
			"        \\noindent\\textbf{Abstract}.",
			"            \\small{",
			"                Here is abstract.",
			"        }\\leavevmode",
			"    \\end{strip}",
			"",
			"    \\section{Introduction}",
			"    Here is Introduction",
			"",
			"    \\nocite{*}",
			"    \\printbibliography",
			"\\end{document}"
		]
	},
	"LaTeX Beamer Template Preambel": {
		"prefix": "bmrprmb",
		"body": [
		"\\usepackage{amsthm}",
		"\\usepackage{mathtools}",
		"\\usepackage{physics}",
		"\\usepackage{calligra}",
		"\\usepackage{csquotes}",
		"\\usepackage{tensor}",
		"\\usepackage[thicklines]{cancel}",
		"\\usepackage{tcolorbox}",
		"\\usepackage{pstricks}",
		"\\usepackage[backend=biber, bibstyle=nature, sorting=nty, citestyle=numeric-comp]{biblatex}",
		"    \\addbibresource{bib.bib}",
		"",
		"\\DeclareMathAlphabet{\\mathcalligra}{T1}{calligra}{m}{n}",
		"\\DeclareFontShape{T1}{calligra}{m}{n}{<->s*[2.2]callig15}{}",
		"\\newcommand{\\scriptr}{\\mathcalligra{r}\\,}",
		"\\newcommand{\\boldscriptr}{\\pmb{\\mathcalligra{r}}\\,}",
		"\\def\\rc{\\scriptr}",
		"\\def\\brc{\\boldscriptr}",
		"\\def\\hrc{\\hat\\brc}",
		"\\newcommand{\\ie}{\\emph{i.e.}}",
		"\\newcommand{\\eg}{\\emph{e.g.}}",
		"\\newcommand{\\rtd}[1]{\\ensuremath{\\left\\lfloor #1 \\right\\rfloor}}",
		"\\newcommand{\\dirac}[1]{\\ensuremath{\\delta \\left( #1 \\right)}}",
		"\\newcommand{\\diract}[1]{\\ensuremath{\\delta^3 \\left( #1 \\right)}}",
		"\\newcommand{\\e}{\\ensuremath{\\epsilon_0}}",
		"\\newcommand{\\m}{\\ensuremath{\\mu_0}}",
		"\\newcommand{\\V}{\\ensuremath{\\mathcal{V}}}",
		"\\newcommand{\\prnt}[1]{\\ensuremath{\\left(#1\\right)}}",
		"\\newcommand{\\colch}[1]{\\ensuremath{\\left[#1\\right]}}",
		"\\newcommand{\\chave}[1]{\\ensuremath{\\left\\{#1\\right\\\\}}}",
		"",
		"\\useoutertheme{infolines}",
		"\\useinnertheme{rectangles}",
		"\\usefonttheme{professionalfonts}",
		"",
		"\\definecolor{orange}{HTML}{f28165}",
		"\\definecolor{gray}{HTML}{303030}",
		"\\definecolor{yellow}{HTML}{f0be52}",
		"\\definecolor{lightorange}{HTML}{f19e58}",
		"",
		"\\renewcommand{\\CancelColor}{\\color{orange}}",
		"",
		"\\makeatletter",
		"\\newcommand{\\mybox}[1]{%",
		"  \\setbox0=\\hbox{#1}%",
		"  \\setlength{\\@tempdima}{\\dimexpr\\wd0+13pt}%",
		"  \\begin{tcolorbox}[colback=orange,colframe=orange,boxrule=0.5pt,arc=4pt,",
		"      left=6pt,right=6pt,top=6pt,bottom=6pt,boxsep=0pt,width=\\@tempdima]",
		"    \\textcolor{white}{#1}",
		"  \\end{tcolorbox}",
		"}",
		"\\makeatother",
		"",
		"\\usecolortheme[named=orange]{structure}",
		"\\usecolortheme{sidebartab}",
		"\\usecolortheme{orchid}",
		"\\usecolortheme{whale}",
		"\\setbeamercolor{alerted text}{fg=yellow}",
		"\\setbeamercolor{block title alerted}{bg=alerted text.fg!90!black}",
		"\\setbeamercolor{block title example}{bg=lightorange!60!black}",
		"\\setbeamercolor{background canvas}{bg=gray}",
		"\\setbeamercolor{normal text}{bg=gray,fg=white}",
		"",
		"\\setbeamertemplate{footline}{",
		"  \\leavevmode",
		"  \\hbox{%",
		"    \\begin{beamercolorbox}[wd=0.5\\paperwidth,ht=2.25ex,dp=1ex,center]{author in head/foot}",
		"      \\usebeamerfont{author in head/foot}\\insertshortauthor~~(\\insertshortinstitute)",
		"    \\end{beamercolorbox}%",
		"    \\begin{beamercolorbox}[wd=0.5\\paperwidth,ht=2.25ex,dp=1ex,right]{date in head/foot}",
		"      \\usebeamerfont{date in head/foot}\\insertframenumber{} / \\inserttotalframenumber\\hspace{2ex}",
		"    \\end{beamercolorbox}",
		"  }",
		"  \\vskip0pt%",
		"}",
		"",
		"\\setbeamertemplate{blocks}[rectangle]",
		"\\setbeamercovered{dynamic}",
		"",
		"\\setbeamertemplate{section page}",
		"{",
		"  \\begin{centering}",
		"    \\begin{beamercolorbox}[sep=27pt,center]{part title}",
		"      \\usebeamerfont{section title}\\insertsection\\par",
		"      \\usebeamerfont{subsection title}\\insertsubsection\\par",
		"    \\end{beamercolorbox}",
		"  \\end{centering}",
		"}",
		"",
		"\\newcommand{\\hlight}[1]{\\colorbox{violet!50}{#1}}",
		"\\newcommand{\\hlighta}[1]{\\colorbox{red!50}{#1}}"
		],
		"description": "LaTeX Beamer template with custom fonts, colors, and macros."
	},
	"Beamer Presentation Template": {
		"prefix": "bmrtmplt",
		"body": [
		"\\documentclass[aspectratio=43]{beamer}",
		"%%",
		"\\usepackage{tikz}",
		"\\usetikzlibrary{backgrounds}",
		"\\usetikzlibrary{arrows,shapes}",
		"\\usetikzlibrary{tikzmark}",
		"\\usetikzlibrary{calc}",
		"\\usepackage{tcolorbox}",
		"%\\setlength{\\fboxsep}{0pt}",
		"\\newcommand{\\hlmath}[2]{\\colorbox{#1!67}{$\\displaystyle #2$}}",
		"\\newcommand{\\hltext}[2]{\\colorbox{#1!67}{#2}}",
		"% 1!17, if light color background",
		"%%",
		"\\usepackage[english]{babel}",
		"%\\usepackage{ctex}",
		"\\usepackage{xeCJK}",
		"\\usepackage{refcount}",
		"\\setbeamertemplate{frametitle continuation}{}",
		"",
		"\\input{preamble}",
		"\\title{\\bfseries",
		"    Here is tile",
		"}",
		"\\subtitle{",
		"    Here is subtitle",
		"}",
		"\\author[Author]{\\bfseries Author}",
		"\\institute[\\textit{",
		"    Department of Physics, Fudan University",
		"}]",
		"{\\textit{",
		"    Department of Physics, Fudan University",
		"}}",
		"\\date{",
		"    \\today",
		"}",
		"\\begin{document}",
		"",
		"    \\frame{\\titlepage}",
		"",
		"    \\begin{frame}{Summary}",
		"        \\tableofcontents",
		"    \\end{frame}",
		"",
		"    % <--- Useful Commands ---> %",
		"",
		"    % \\addtocounter{framenumber}{-1}",
		"    % \\setcounter{equation}{\\getrefnumber{eq:Eq}-1}",
		"    % \\begin{frame}[allowframebreaks]{References}",
		"",
		"    % dont forget to add a \"%\" after \"\\end{tikzpicture}\"",
		"",
		"    % <--- Useful Commands ---> %",
		"",
		"    \\section{Introduction}",
		"    \\frame{\\sectionpage}",
		"        \\begin{frame}{Introduction Frame 1}",
		"            \\uncover<+->{",
		"                Some sentences. I am not use \\texttt{\\textbackslash center} here! So it is left align.",
		"            }",
		"            \\uncover<+->{\\[\\Downarrow\\]",
		"            \\centering Some, words, here.",
		"            }",
		"            \\uncover<+->{\\[\\Downarrow\\]",
		"                \\begin{equation}",
		"                    E = m \\tikzmarknode{c}{\\hlmath{blue}{c^2}}",
		"                \\end{equation}",
		"            }",
		"            \\uncover<+->{",
		"                \\begin{tikzpicture}[overlay, remember picture, >=stealth, nodes={align=left, inner ysep=2pt}, <-]",
		"                    \\path (c.south) ++ (0,-0.8em) node[anchor=north east, color=blue!67] (c node){volocity of light};",
		"                    \\draw [color=blue!57](c.south) |- ([xshift=-0.3ex, color=blue]c node.south west);",
		"                \\end{tikzpicture}",
		"            }",
		"        \\end{frame}",
		"",
		"    \\section*{References}",
		"        \\begin{frame}[allowframebreaks]{References}",
		"            \\nocite{*}",
		"            \\printbibliography",
		"        \\end{frame}",
		"",
		"    \\section{}",
		"    \\begin{frame}{}",
		"        \\centering",
		"            \\Huge\\bfseries",
		"        \\textcolor{orange}{The End}",
		"    \\end{frame}",
		"\\end{document}"
		],
		"description": "LaTeX Beamer presentation template for academic presentations with TikZ and custom macros."
	}
}","doctex.json":"{
	// Place your snippets for doctex here. Each snippet is defined under a snippet name and has a prefix, body and 
	// description. The prefix is what is used to trigger the snippet and the body will be expanded and inserted. Possible variables are:
	// $1, $2 for tab stops, $0 for the final cursor position, and ${1:label}, ${2:another} for placeholders. Placeholders with the 
	// same ids are connected.
	// Example:
	// "Print to console": {
	// 	"prefix": "log",
	// 	"body": [
	// 		"console.log('$1');",
	// 		"$2"
	// 	],
	// 	"description": "Log output to console"
	// },
}","tex.json":"{
	// Place your snippets for tex here. Each snippet is defined under a snippet name and has a prefix, body and 
	// description. The prefix is what is used to trigger the snippet and the body will be expanded and inserted. Possible variables are:
	// $1, $2 for tab stops, $0 for the final cursor position, and ${1:label}, ${2:another} for placeholders. Placeholders with the 
	// same ids are connected.
	// Example:
	// "Print to console": {
	// 	"prefix": "log",
	// 	"body": [
	// 		"console.log('$1');",
	// 		"$2"
	// 	],
	// 	"description": "Log output to console"
	// }
	// "Tikzmark Node Highlight": {
	// 	"prefix": "tl",
	// 	"body": "\\tikzmarknode{markname}{$TM_SELECTED_TEXT}",
	// 	"description": "Wrap selected text with tikzmarknode"
	// },
}"}
